text: Perdiendo el norte is a 2015 Spanish comedy-drama movie. It was directed by Nacho G. Velilla, and starred by Yon González, Julián López and Blanca Suárez.PERDIENDO EL NORTE, Fotogramas. == Plot == Hugo and Braulio are two young students with their respective degrees, but they're unable to find any job or future due to economic crisis in Spain. After seeing a TV-program about how a Spanish citizen is living in Germany they decide to move to Berlin. However, the things did not turn out as they had believed. == Cast == * Yon González as Hugo * Julián López as Braulio * Blanca Suárez as Carla * Úrsula Corberó as Nadia * Javier Cámara as Próspero * José Sacristán as Andrés * Miki Esparbé as Rafa * Carmen Machi as Benigna * Malena Alterio as Marisol * Alberto Chicote as Priest * Arturo Valls as Spanish immigrant in Berlin interviewee on TV * Arantxa Aranguren as Juana == References == == Other websites== * * Official website Category:2015 comedy-drama movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Spanish- language movies
title: Perdiendo el norte
